sentence: State Treasurer Scott Fitzpatrick and state Rep. David Gregory, R-Sunset Hills, are both competing for the GOP nomination for state auditor.
author: Kurt Erickson
title: Missouri Republicans trade jabs as race for U.S. Senate kicks off

sentence: On Tuesday, state Treasurer Scott Fitzpatrick, a Republican, requested an emergency meeting of the Missouri State Employees Retirement System board of trustees to prevent the future purchase of Russian securities and to discuss the strategic divestment of existing Russian holdings.
author: Kurt Erickson
title: Missouri officials join push to put financial pressure on Russia

sentence: Treasurer Scott Fitzpatrick is leading a push by the Missouri State Employees Retirement System to divest state pension funds of any Russian assets, which were worth about $13 million last week.
author: Kurt Erickson
title: Missouri House urges Biden and Congress to take a strong stance against Russia

sentence: State Treasurer Scott Fitzpatrick has twice backed efforts to hire a company to review the spending surrounding the state’s effort to help convince Rams owner Stan Kroenke and his National Football League colleagues to keep the team in Missouri.
author: Kurt Erickson
title: Bid to review failed Rams rescue plan fizzling after two false starts

sentence: Missouri State Treasurer Scott Fitzpatrick said that progressive asset managers are “using our money, the people of Missouri’s money, to try to force their own political will on these companies.
author: Kevin Stocklin
title: State Pension Funds Gamble Workers’ Retirement on ESG
